mapper.insert: /* MyPageDAO.insertSellerApply 판매자 신청*/ INSERT INTO T_SELLER_APPLY ( USER_NUM , SELLER_APPLY_STATUS_CD , REGISTER_DT , CHANGE_DT ) VALUES ( #{userNum} , '01' , SYSDATE() , SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: /*MyPageDAO.selectSellerApply 판매자신청내역 조회*/ SELECT TSA.APPLY_NUM /* 신청번호*/ , TSA.USER_NUM /* 신청자*/ , TSA.SELLER_APPLY_STATUS_CD /* 판매자신청상태코드[COM1007]*/ , EVERYTHINGSHOP.GET_CODE_NAME('COM1007', TSA.SELLER_APPLY_STATUS_CD) AS SELLER_APPLY_STATUS_NM /* 판매자신청상태코드명[COM1007]*/ , TSA.REJECT_REASON /* 반려사유*/ , TSA.REGISTER_DT /* 등록일자*/ , TSA.CHANGE_DT /* 변경일자*/ FROM T_SELLER_APPLY TSA WHERE TSA.USER_NUM = #{userNum} ORDER BY TSA.REGISTER_DT DESC
